Articles.Content:
I've problems with using ckan.exe  I want to reinstall it. 

I've installed some modes manually before I'd found out ckan. After installing some modes from ckan the game freezes at loading screen. The problem is the older mods. When I delete the mods, which I manually added, ckan detects as they are still installed. And I couldn't get rid of this problem. How can I uninstall it completely ? 

Edited February 5, 2016 by berkekrkn

9 minutes ago, berkekrkn said:

How can I uninstall it completely ? 

Delete the both ckan.exe and the 'CKAN' directory.

Edited February 5, 2016 by steve_v

I would suggest deleting any mods from your gamedata directory that you want to reinstall with CKAN as well then starting with a fresh gamedata folder for CKAN to start with (it likes to start clean) then reinstall all your mods with CKAN.

Make sure you back up your persistence file as you can lose craft if you load your game with missing mods.

13 hours ago, John FX said:

I would suggest deleting any mods from your gamedata directory that you want to reinstall with CKAN as well then starting with a fresh gamedata folder for CKAN to start with (it likes to start clean) then reinstall all your mods with CKAN.

Make sure you back up your persistence file as you can lose craft if you load your game with missing mods.

Just so your sure you are getting a good answer I'm just going to confirm that John has given you some sound advice on what to do, however if your still on sure what to do just say so or if you continue to have problem also say so in here, as I may have another way for you to fix the problem however it may take longer etc. but I hope John's way works for you and you can get on with playing, so best of luck to you Berke.

 

Vita.
